About

Hi! I’m a graduate student in the Department of Statistics at Iowa State University and currently teaching Introduction to Business Statistics. My interests are quickly gravitating toward interactive statistical graphics. I love using R-studio, knitr, and Markdown to create reproducible, flexible, and dynamic stuff. Besides golf, traveling, and guinness, I can’t get enough of: data-oriented programming, short cuts, and good graphics.

© 2013 Carson Sievert with help from Vistat, Jekyll Bootstrap, and The Hooligan Theme
